snippet.title: The Space Battle Royale - Spark Era
snippet.description:
It’s a new frontier. Advanced AI meets massively multiplayer combat… in space!

Spark Era is the first game in the world that uses advanced machine learning to create a J.A.R.V.I.S.-style personalized in-game battle companion. 

Take on thousands of other players and conquer the universe with your revolutionary human-level AI agent by your side, dispensing personalized advice based on your gameplay style and skill level. 

Spark Era reads your emotions and analyzes your behavior to generate unique, personalized events and consequences. NLP-based deep-learning models continue to make NPC behavior even more natural and believable over time. 

Choose from four powerful factions: Earth Confederation, Empire of Amda, Asman Zerg, and the Titans. 

Collect different character cards, including Common Soldier, Star Soldier, Scientist, Commander, and Leader, and thrust them into immersive, visually stunning 3D interstellar battles. 

Join eSports tournaments and fight in huge battle royale PvP events with minimal latency, powered by the world-class AWS tech that powers PUBG, Diablo Immortal, Fortnite Apex, and Free Fire. 

Team up with other players to take on the harsh conditions of Spark Era’s vast wartorn universe. 

And make a new AI friend!
